questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?

B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A mural or wall art

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A painting
C) A mural of a robotic figure
D) A wildlife animal

A) A tree
B) A car
C) A robotic figure and a car
D) A group of people

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A beach
C) A wall
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A path
B) A mural
C) A table
D) A bench

A) Sitting down
B) Walking
C) Standing next to a car
D) Flying

B) Police car

D) Sports car

B) The rear

D) History
